format:
<style>
    /*
    Pre-defined colors
    */
    :root {
        
        --color-main-base: #0d6ab2;
        --title-bar-background: #020F19;
        --page-background: #031726;
        --side-bar-backgound: #020F19;
        --group-text: #ffffff;
        --group-border: #0d6ab2;
        --group-background: #073558;
        --widget-text: #ffffff;
        --widget-colour: #0d6ab2;
        --widget-background: #094B7D;
        --color-button-hover: #148FED;
        /*--color-main-dark:  rgb(148,87,87,1);
        --color-main-light:  rgb(0,0,69,1);
        --color-main: var(--color-main-light);
        --color-text-light: rgba(12, 9, 62,1);
        --color-text-dark: rgb(254, 222, 222);
        --color-text: var(--color-text-light);
        --color-widget-border: rgb(84, 78, 78);
        --color-widget-trans: rgba(178, 178, 178, 0.2);
        --color-disabled: rgb(200, 200, 210);
        --color-button-light: rgba(5,16,60,0.8);
        --color-button-dark: rgba(54,16,16,0.8);
        --color-button: var(--color-button-light);
        --color-selection-light: rgba(100,100,155,1);
        --color-selection-dark: rgba(154,116,116,0.8);
        --color-selection: var(--color-selection-light);.nr-dashboard-theme
        --color-tint-light: rgba(182, 182, 255,1);
        --color-tint-dark: rgba(255, 182, 182,1);
        --color-tint: var(--color-tint-light);
        --color-gauge-light: rgba(19,1,106,0.8);
        --color-gauge-dark: rgba(229,156,131,0.8);
        --color-gauge: var(--color-gauge-light);
        --color-background-primary-light: rgba(230,246,246,1);
        --color-background-secondary-light: rgba(188,212,217,0.5);
        --color-background-primary-dark: rgba(17,02,02,1);
        --color-background-secondary-dark: rgba(07,0,0,0.8);
        --color-background-primary: var(--color-background-primary-light); light green blue 
        --color-background-secondary: var(--color-background-primary-light);
        --color-joystick-center: #4040afd6;
        --color-input-border: #4040afd6;
        --color-white-text-button: #ffffff;
        --color-gradient-test:*/ 
    }
    /*
    Various CSS segments borrowed from the Node Red forums and customized
    */
#checkbox{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}   
#settingsForm{
display:flex;
justify-content: center;
}

#configureForm{
display: flex;
justify-content:center;

}
   
.custom_input {
    width: 5.2rem;
}

/* prepare wrapper element */
.test {
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
}

/* position the unit to the right of the wrapper */
.test::after {
  position: absolute;
  top: 2px;
  right: .5em;
  transition: all .05s ease-in-out;
  color: #333333;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* move unit more to the left on hover or focus within
   for arrow buttons will appear to the right of number inputs */
.test:hover::after,
.test:focus-within::after {
  right: 1em;
}

/*handle Firefox (arrows always shown) */
@supports (-moz-appearance:none) {
  .test::after {
    right: 1em;
  }
}

/* set the unit abbreviation for each unit class */
.test::after {
  content: '';
}

.speed::after {
  content: '/s';  
}

.accel::after {
  content: '/s';  
}    
/* */

.slidecontainer {
width: 100%;
overflow:hidden;
}

.angleContainer{
 display: flex;
 padding-bottom: 8px;

}

.valueContainer{
 display: flex; 
justify-content: space-around;
padding-bottom: 7px;
}

.padding{
    padding: 10px;
}

.preset_contain {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: flex-end;
}

#label_container {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

#preset_slider_container{
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

.slider {
-webkit-appearance: none;
width: 100%;
height: 25px;
background: var(--group-text) ;
outline: none;
opacity: 1;
-webkit-transition: .2s;
transition: opacity .2s;
border:  1px solid black;
}

.slider:hover {
opacity: 0.7;
}

.slider::-webkit-slider-thumb {
-webkit-appearance: none;
appearance: none;
width: 25px;
height: 25px;
background: var(--color-button-hover);
cursor: pointer;

}

.slider::-moz-range-thumb {
width: 25px;
height: 25px;
background: var(--color-button-hover);
cursor: pointer;
}
/*#label_1 {
float: left; 
}

#label_2 {
float: right; 

}*/
#x{
    width: 1rem;
    height: 1rem;
}
 #y{
    width: 1rem;
    height: 1rem;
}
.back{
    opacity:1!important;
    }
.front{
    background-color: var(--widget-text) !important;
}

button, html, input, select, textarea {
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif;
    
}
.custom-select{
background-color: var(--group-background);
color: var(--widget-text);
padding: 10px 0;
margin: 10px 0;
border:none;
width: 250px;
font-size: 16px;
font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif;
box-shadow: 0 5px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
-webkit-appearance: button;
appearance: button;
outline: none;
/*border-radius:0.2em;*/
}

.pure-material-textfield-standard {
position: relative;
display: inline-block;
font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif;;
font-size: 16px;
line-height: 1.5;
overflow: hidden;
}
#form{
    overflow:hidden;
}
#joystickContainer_6bd73416c2e53bb1{
    /*background-color:var(--color-main);*/
  
}

.form__group {
  position: relative;
  padding-top: 5%;
  display: block;
}

.form__field {
  font-family: inherit;
  width: 100%;
  border: 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #d2d2d2;
  outline: 0;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: var(--widget-text);
  padding-top: 5%;
  margin-bottom: 5%;
  background: transparent;
  transition: border-color 0.2s;
}

.form__field::placeholder {
  color: transparent;
}

.form__field:placeholder-shown ~ .form__label {
  font-size: 16px;
  cursor: text;
  top: 20px;
}

.form__label,
.form__field:focus ~ .form__label {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  display: block;
  transition: 0.2s;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: var(--color-main);
}

.form__field:focus ~ .form__label {
  color: var(--color-main);
}

.form__field:focus {
  padding-top: 5%;
  margin-bottom: 5%;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--widget-text);
}

.pure-material-button-contained {
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: none;
    /*border-radius: 4px;*/
    padding: 0 26px;
    margin: 5px 0;
    min-width: 64px;
    height: 36px;
    vertical-align: middle;
    text-align: center;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    /*color: rgb(79 254 254);*/
    color: var(--widget-text);
    background-color: var(--widget-colour);
    box-shadow: 0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif;
    font-weight: 500;
    line-height: 36px;
    overflow: hidden;
    outline: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
}

.pure-material-button-contained::-moz-focus-inner {
    border: none;
}

/* Overlay */
.pure-material-button-contained::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    background-color: white;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.2s;
}

/* Ripple */
.pure-material-button-contained::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    padding: 0;
    width: 32px; /* Safari */
    height: 32px; /* Safari */
    background-color: white;
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1);
    transition: opacity 1s, transform 0.5s;
}

/* Hover, Focus */
.pure-material-button-contained:hover,
.pure-material-button-contained:focus {
    box-shadow: 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 4px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
    background: var(--color-button-hover);
    
}

.pure-material-button-contained:hover::before {
    opacity: 0.08;
}

.pure-material-button-contained:focus::before {
    opacity: 0.24;
}

.pure-material-button-contained:hover:focus::before {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

/* Active */
.pure-material-button-contained:active {
    box-shadow: 0 5px 5px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 8px 10px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 3px 14px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
}

.pure-material-button-contained:active::after {
    opacity: 0.32;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0);
    transition: transform 0s;
}

/* Disabled */
.pure-material-button-contained:disabled {
    color: blue;
    background-color: var(--color-main-dark);
    box-shadow: none;
    cursor: initial;
}

.pure-material-button-contained:disabled::before {
    opacity: 0;
}

.pure-material-button-contained:disabled::after {
    opacity: 0;
}
.text{
    font-size: 16px;
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif;
}

.nr-dashboard-text .value {
 font-weight: normal
}

.nr-dashboard-template {
    padding: 0px;
}

/* side bar edge color*/
.nr-menu-item-active div button{
    border-right: 4px solid var(--group-text);
}

/*camera sliders color*/
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-thumb:after{
    background-color: var(--color-input-border);
}

/* color wheel border 
#color-picker-LumaAdjust{
   
}
*/



/* form here*/


.nr-dashboard-theme md-content .nr-dashboard-form form md-input-container .md-input{
    color: var(--color-text);
}

.nr-dashboard-theme md-input-container.md-default-theme .md-input, md-input-container .md-input {
    color: #eeeeee;
    border-color: var(--color-main) !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme md-content .nr-dashboard-form form:not(.md-input-invalid) label {
    color: var(--color-main) !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form form .md-input-invalid input {
    border-color: var(--color-main) !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme md-content .nr-dashboard-form form .md-input-invalid label {
    color: var(--color-text) !important;
}




.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form-button {
    background-color:var(--widget-colour);
    color: var(--widget-text);
    box-shadow:0 -1px 5px 1px #00000045;
    text-shadow:4px 2px 4px #00000045;
    /*border-radius:10px;*/
    border:1px solid var(--color-widget-border);
}

.masonry-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height:100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    background: var(--page-background);
}
.nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
    background:var(--color-main);
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 4px 0px #000000bb;
    border-radius: 10px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
    background-color: var(--group-background);
    color: var(--group-text);
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 8px 0px #00000080;
}
body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
    background-color: var(--widget-background);
    color: var(--widget-text);
    text-shadow: 4px 2px 4px #00000045;
    box-shadow: 0 -1px 5px 1px #00000045;
    /*border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid var(--color-widget-border);*/
}
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    color: var(--group-text);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-gauge text {
    fill: var(--color-gauge);
    margin: 8px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button  {
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    cursor: pointer;
    min-height: 36px;
    min-width: 88px;
    line-height: 36px;
    vertical-align: middle;
    align-items: center;
    text-align: center;
    /*border-radius: 12px;*/
    box-sizing: border-box;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    user-select: none;
    outline: none;
    border: 0;
    padding: 0 6px;
    /*margin: 6px 8px;*/
    background: var(--widget-colour);
    color:var(--color-text);
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-style: inherit;
    font-variant: inherit;
    font-family: inherit;
    text-decoration: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: box-shadow .4s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1),background-color .4s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template {
background-color: var(--widget-background);
}
.nr-dashboard-template p, .nr-dashboard-template h1, .nr-dashboard-template h2, .nr-dashboard-template h3, .nr-dashboard-template h4 {
color: var(--color-main) !important;
background-color: var(--color-background-secondary) !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template .md-button:disabled {
    color: var(--color-disabled);
}
md-toolbar#toolbar{
    color: red;
    background: var(--title-bar-background);
}
body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
    color: var(--color-text);
}
body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
    color: var(--group-text);
    background: var(--side-bar-backgound);
}
body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
    color: var(--color-background-secondary);
    background-color: transparent;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
    background-color: var(--color-button-hover);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-track {
    background-color: var(--widget-text);
}
md-slider .md-thumb {
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0px #101086;
}    
.nr-dashboard-slider .md-thumb:after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, var(--color-button), var(--color-tint));
    border-style: none;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template ::-webkit-scrollbar {
    background-color: var(--page-background);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background-color: var(--widget-text);
}
md-switch .md-thumb {
    background-color: var(--color-main);
}
md-switch .md-bar {
    background-color: var(--color-background-secondary);
}
md-switch.md-checked:not([disabled]) .md-bar {
    background-color: var(--color-button) !important; 
}
md-switch.md-checked:not([disabled]) .md-thumb {
    background-color: var(--color-text) !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
    background:unset;
    color: var(--widget-text);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
    background-color:  var(--color-group-background);
    color: var(--widget-text);
    height: 29px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    smargin-left: 10px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    margin-top: 2px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 6px 6px #24202133;
    transition: 0.3s;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value, .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value.md-select-placeholder {
    margin-top: -3px;
    border-color: var(--color-widget-border);
    color: var(--color-text);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
    color: var(--group-text) !important;
    background-color: var(--color-button-hover) !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 8px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:hover {
    background-color: var(--color-button-hover) !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option .md-ripple-container{
    border-radius: 10px;
}
</style>

    });
</script>
